creator: moshiX@yahoo.com
text:
All the links in the specified URL are broken.

http://ant.apache.org/manual/base_task_classes.html

Moshe

Thats why the online version of the complete site differs from local version.
The manual is part of the Ant site which is genenerated from sources in xdocs 
directory and others (e.g. javadoc). 

While there is consens which infos should be put onto the normal webpage (the 
newest) there isn´t any with javadocs. Which version should be online? The 
newest (CVS HEAD), the latest released (1.5.3-1), or what? So there is a page 
which sais that and gives a link to the newest javadocs generated by gump.

But that works only if you don´t have deep links into the javadocs, like here.

If you have the docs locally that links work.

The process how to generate the site is documented on 
http://ant.apache.org/faq.html#creating-faq. Javadocs are generated by the main 
buildfile of Ant.
creator: jan@materne.de
